Candidates.Name: Adernia
Candidates.Desc: Standalone modded follower. Looks like Jin Soul from Loona.

Candidates.Name: Aela
Candidates.Desc: Aela is a werewolf who is a part of the inner cicle within the Companions. She is a huntress who does not like cowards or milk drinkers. Aela love the heat of battle and does not care for boasting.

Candidates.Name: Iona
Candidates.Desc: Iona becomes your housecarl after becoming the thane of Riften. She is loyal and often offers praise and compliment.

Candidates.Name: Jenassa
Candidates.Desc: Jenassa is a mercenary for hire. She has a dislike for caves and prefers being above ground. Jenassa has a strong moral and acts rather respectful but somewhat ungrateful at times.

Candidates.Name: Jordis The Sword-Maiden
Candidates.Desc: Jordis becomes your housecarl after becoming the thane of Solitude. She is loyal and often offers praise and compliment.

Candidates.Name: Lydia
Candidates.Desc: Lydia becomes your housecarl after becoming the thane of Whiterun. She is loyal and often offers praise and compliment.

Candidates.Name: Serana
Candidates.Desc: Serana is a friendly person who have had a great deal of loneliness due to her troubled childhood. She often shares about her past and shares intimate details about her life.

Candidates.Name: Uthgerd The Unbroken
Candidates.Desc: Uthgerd is loyal and a straight to the point kind of person. She has a strong moral and will not commit crimes. Uthgerd has a fighter's disposition and is rather headstrong.
